question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "It has been observed that, while successfully reproduces the large scale distribution of matter and the evolution of cosmic structures, it encounters several inconsistencies on galactic and sub galactic scales, such as the missing satellites, core cusp and too big to fail problem"?
